淴字的基本解释

淴
hū
〔淴泱（
〔淴浴〕方言，洗澡。
y乶g ）〕（水流）疾速。

淴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hū］
［《廣韻》烏没切，入没，影。］
(1)水流之貌。形容如水流逝，情况一天天坏下去。
(2)见“淴泱”。
(3)方言。洗澡。

淴字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　淴； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页632第07
【廣韻】【集韻】?烏沒切，音嗢。水出聲。　又淴泱，水流疾貌。【郭璞·江賦】潏湟淴泱。　又【集韻】呼骨切，音忽。水貌。或作淈。　又呼內切，音誨。與㳷同。　又【韻補】叶虛屈切，音獝。【蔡邕·述行賦】唐虞渺其旣遠兮，常俗生於積習。周道鞠爲茂草兮，哀正路之日淴。

淴字的源字形

暂无。

Sorrow
Basic explanation of words
Sorrow
hū
〔淴泱(
[Song Yu] dialect, take a bath.
y 乶g )] (The current) is fast.
Sorrow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hū］
["Guangyun" Wu did not cut, enter, and shadow. ]
(1) The appearance of the current. Described as the passing of water, the situation is getting worse day by day.
(2) See "Song Yang".
(3) Dialects. Take a bath.
Sorrow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　淴; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 632 No. 07
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Wu did not cut, the sound increased. The water makes a sound.　It's swaying again, the water is sloppy. 【Guo Pu·Jiang Fu】潏湟淴泱.　[Jiyun] Huguchi, sound suddenly. Water appearance. Or as a joke.　 Called for internal cutting again, sounding. Same as 㳷.　[Rhyme Supplement] Ye Xu cuts and cuts, and the sound is 獝. 【Cai Yong·Shu Xing Fu】Tang Yumiao is a long-distance man, and the common customs are born out of accumulated habits. Zhou Daoju is lush and grassy, mourning the day when the road is right.
